[File: aptos-core/storage/aptosdb/src/db_debugger/examine/print_db_versions.rs] [LedgerInfo Signature Extraction] Does the ledger info output include complete BLS signatures that could be analyzed for cryptographic weaknesses or validator identification? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/storage/aptosdb/src/db_debugger/examine/print_raw_data_by_version.rs] [Version Enumeration Attack] Can repeatedly querying sequential versions enable reconstruction of the complete blockchain state, effectively bypassing any state privacy mechanisms? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/aptosdb/src/db_debugger/examine/print_db_versions.rs] [JMT Node Version Analysis] Can the max JMT node version be compared against transaction versions to infer the structure and depth of the Jellyfish Merkle Tree, enabling tree traversal attacks? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/storage/aptosdb/src/db_debugger/examine/print_db_versions.rs] [Shard Pruner Race Condition] Can querying shard-specific pruner progress while pruning is actively occurring cause race conditions that expose partially pruned state or cause iterator failures? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/aptosdb/src/db_debugger/examine/print_raw_data_by_version.rs] [Event Version Mismatch] If events are returned for a version that doesn't exist or has been pruned, could error handling failures reveal information about pruning state or database inconsistencies? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/storage/aptosdb/src/db_debugger/examine/print_db_versions.rs lines 245-255] [Epoch Ending Signature Leak] Do the last 10 epoch endings expose complete validator signatures and quorum certificates that could be analyzed to identify Byzantine validators or voting patterns? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/aptosdb/src/db_debugger/examine/print_db_versions.rs] [MetadataDb Key Enumeration] Can enumerating all DbMetadataKey variants through the schema reveal internal database structure, feature flags, or configuration that assists in vulnerability discovery? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/storage/aptosdb/src/db_debugger/examine/print_raw_data_by_version.rs] [Transaction Type Identification] Can the transaction data extraction reveal transaction types (governance, staking, transfers) enabling targeted analysis of high-value transactions? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/storage/aptosdb/src/db_debugger/examine/print_db_versions.rs] [TransactionAccumulatorSchema Leaf Access] Can accessing TransactionAccumulatorSchema expose leaf nodes that could be manipulated or forged to create invalid Merkle proofs? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/aptosdb/src/db_debugger/examine/print_db_versions.rs] [Overall vs Individual Progress] Can the difference between 'Overall Progress' and individual database progress indicators reveal consensus lag or database sync issues exploitable for double-spend attacks? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/storage/aptosdb/src/db_debugger/examine/print_raw_data_by_version.rs] [WriteSet State Transition] Can analyzing write sets reveal the complete state transition logic of smart contracts, enabling reverse engineering of contract behavior or discovery of contract vulnerabilities? [File: aptos-core/storage/aptosdb/src/db_debugger/examine/print_db_versions.rs] [EpochEndingStateMerkle Special Handling] Why is EpochEndingStateMerkle pruned separately, and could exploiting this separation enable epoch boundary attacks or state fork conditions? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/aptosdb/src/db_debugger/examine/print_db_versions.rs] [Metadata Item Limit] Does print_metadata_items() have any limit on the number of items printed, or could a database with millions of metadata entries cause output truncation or buffer overflow? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/storage/aptosdb/src/db_debugger/examine/print_raw_data_by_version.rs] [Auxiliary Info State Root] Does PersistedAuxiliaryInfo contain state root hashes that could be compared across versions to detect state forks or consensus divergence? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/aptosdb/src/db_debugger/examine/print_db_versions.rs] [Iterator Error Handling] Do database iterators properly handle schema deserialization errors, or could corrupted database entries cause panics during iteration? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/storage/aptosdb/src/db_debugger/examine/print_raw_data_by_version.rs] [Event Count Leakage] Can the number of events returned for a version reveal information about transaction complexity or smart contract behavior useful for MEV or front-running? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/storage/aptosdb/src/db_debugger/examine/print_db_versions.rs] [Shard Count Exposure] Does exposing NUM_STATE_SHARDS reveal the sharding configuration that could be used to optimize attacks targeting specific shards or accounts? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/storage/aptosdb/src/db_debugger/examine/print_db_versions.rs] [Postorder Index Calculation] Can the to_postorder_index() calculation overflow for very large accumulator trees, causing incorrect node count reporting or tree structure corruption? (Medium)
